markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Juggler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1187) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 74</row>

**Archetype** [Juggler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=36)

**Prerequisites**
Dexterity 14

</column>

---

You become trained in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12); if you were already trained in Performance, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the [Juggle](/Feats.aspx?ID=1199) skill feat, even if you don’t meet its prerequisites.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained one other feat from the juggler archetype.

<title level="2">Juggler Dedication leads to...</title>
[Focused Juggler](/Feats.aspx?ID=1188), [Lobbed Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=1191), [Opportune Throw](/Feats.aspx?ID=1192), [Quick Juggler](/Feats.aspx?ID=1189), [Reflexive Catch](/Feats.aspx?ID=1190)
name: Juggler Dedication
